summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It includes an out-count sheet, an inmate roster, and other count-related forms, showing the facility's population and assignments. The inmate roster lists several inmates with 'SUICIDE' watch assignments.

events.title: Inmate Roster and Assignments
events.description: Administrative record showing inmate assignments, including several inmates placed on 'SUICIDE' watch in the hospital (HOSP) unit.

events.title: Official Out Count
events.description: Bureau of Prisons count sheet documenting the inmate population count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 9-10, 2019, shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
An inmate roster shows four inmates (identified by register numbers) assigned to 'HOSP' with 'SUICIDE' watch designations.
An out-count sheet records a total inmate population of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for population counts and inmate assignments.
The forms include timestamps and operational codes, indicating routine prison administrative procedures.
